Globally, the end of the pandemic isn't near.
 
More than a million lives depend on improving our response quickly.
 
Don‚Äôt be blinded by the light at the end of the tunnel. There isn't enough vaccine and the virus is gathering strength & speed. Global cooperation is crucial. 1/
